channel.title: Cleaning Up on Save The World
channel.description: Recent content in Cleaning Up on Save The World

item.title: Why
item.description: Let’s start with Aaron Stark’s story. Do you see why it has to start here? There are so many, many children that could tell similar stories. This has to stop! These kids need our love and support. But instead just like in Aaron’s story the social worker buys into his mom’s well practiced lies and steps back and does nothing. Making the situation even worse than it was before.

item.title: Hakomi Principles
item.description: Loving Presence Non violence Mindfulness Mind/Body Truth Change Organicity Unity If you know Hakomi a few of these principles might look new to you. Loving Presence was added here. Truth and Change were added here. This brings us to eight principles which seems like the right number to me. Eight is a magic number explain extra principles Hakomi Principles (for healing) Hakomi intro New principles Loving presence should be included preparation for Truth Non violence different schools of personal growth; “pop-it” Truth Coyote Accountability Victim stories Mindfulness Mind/Body Organicity Unity Change Accept that change is possible Accept that change is inevitable Creativity Body

item.title: Body
item.description: Outline Body It all starts in the body Every emotion has a place in the body the body keeps the score Every organism is striving towards healing. Always. organicity Diet Exercise Healing our sexuality HAI
